trans-unit.source: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma forma geométrica 2D definida pela combinação dos dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>propriedade especifica como duas geometrias serão combinadas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that CombinedGeometry combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Observação CombinedGeometry combina a área especificada pela duas geometrias, geometrias assim que não possuem área (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) desaparecem quando combinados.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>

trans-unit.source: Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, a CombinedGeometry, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class.
trans-unit.target: Geometrias podem ser combinadas de várias maneiras: usando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, um CombinedGeometry, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> creates a composite geometry from one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>cria uma geometria composta de uma ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A CombinedGeometry uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: -Um CombinedGeometry usa uma operação booliana especificada para combinar a área descrita por dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: - The static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class behaves in exactly the same manner as the CombinedGeometry object.
trans-unit.target: -Estático <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>classe se comporta exatamente da mesma maneira como o objeto CombinedGeometry.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Careful thought should be involved when using a CombinedGeometry to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive.
trans-unit.target: Deve ser envolvido cuidadosamente ao usar um CombinedGeometry para executar uma união, pois ele pode ser muito caro de CPU.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> will work better.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>funcionará melhor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: Use a CombinedGeometry only when any of the following apply: - The geometric operation is not a union.
trans-unit.target: Use um CombinedGeometry somente quando qualquer uma das seguintes opções for aplicável:-a operação geométrica não é uma união.

trans-unit.source: - Either of the geometries have a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> actually matters).
trans-unit.target: -Adicione as geometrias um <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>valor <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>e as geometrias são interseção consigo mesmo (ou seja, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>, na verdade, é importante).</xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>

trans-unit.source: - Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached).
trans-unit.target: -Time não é uma preocupação, mas é de espaço (por exemplo, se a geometria é criada uma vez e, em seguida, armazenado em cache).

trans-unit.source: Typically, CombinedGeometry produces smaller output than <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, CombinedGeometry produz saída de menor que <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> does not provide the desired outline.
trans-unit.target: -A geometria resultante será traçada ou usada em uma animação de caminho e <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>não fornece a estrutura de tópicos desejada.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A CombinedGeometry is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Freezable CombinedGeometry um de recursos é um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>recursos, como congelamento e clonagem, consulte o [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>

trans-unit.source: The method by which `geometry1` and `geometry2` are combined.
trans-unit.target: O método pelo qual `geometry1` e `geometry2` são combinados.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos, <> </> *>, e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The method by which `geometry1` and `geometry2` are combined.
trans-unit.target: O método pelo qual `geometry1` e `geometry2` são combinados.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*> applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>aplicada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que especifica a caixa delimitadora deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: **Observação:** este método não considera qualquer canetas.

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: Se animações estiverem presentes, os valores base do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>objeto são usados para calcular a caixa delimitadora.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A caixa delimitadora deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (mas eles não podem resolver) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> era de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method by which the two geometries (specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2*> properties) are combined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o método pelo qual as duas geometrias (especificado pelo <> </> *> e <> </> *> propriedades) são combinados.

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.target: O método pelo qual <> </> *> e <> </> *> são combinados.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém a área da região preenchida.

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: A tolerância computacional de erro.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the error tolerance will be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como a tolerância de erro será interpretada.

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this combined geometry.
trans-unit.target: A área da região preenchida deste combinados geometry.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto está vazio.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **True** se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> estiver vazia; caso contrário, **false**.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto pode ter em segmentos de curva.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **True** se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto pode ter em segmentos de curva; caso contrário, **false**.
